creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Elizabeth and Willard Clark
inscription: sheet 1: 一〇中〇 (?); sheet 2: 昭和四年十月念七日和可山〇〇〇〇 (...1929...); sheet 3: 〇〇壬申秋十月〇〇〇〇 (...1930...); sheet 4: 〇〇〇〇　〇〇〇 (?)
markings: sheet 1: URC red seal: 師在我 {shi zai ga}; LLC red seals: 福田世耕 {Fukuda Seikō} [Fukuda Seikō #6], 静處 {seisho} [seisho #6]; sheet 2: 福田世耕 {Fukuda Seikō} [Fukuda Seikō #4], 静處 {seisho} [seisho #4]; sheet 3: LRC red seal: 如南山之壽 {Jonanzan no kotobuki}, ULC: 静印 {Sei in}, 凌雲 {Ryōun}
signed: sheet 1: 静處 {Seisho}; sheet 2: 古道人記 {Kodōjin ki} (recorded by Kodōjin); sheet 3: 凌雲求 {Ryōun kyū} (assisted by Ryōun); sheet 4: 昭和七年十月七日　古道人 {Shōwa shichinen jūgatsu nanoka Kodōjin} (October 7, 1932, Kodōjin)
title: Memoires of the Osmund Mountain House
